title: Many bugfixes and quality of life improvements

changes.change: You can now migrate Shadowlands non-Encrypted routes to Encrypted routes from the route overview's Actions dropdown.
Enemies are no longer marked as Inspiring on the map if your route does not have the Inspiring affix assigned to it.

Pull percentages (or raw values) zoom level is now configurable per floor - this is useful when a floor is very small and you want to have the percentages show on all zoom levels, or the other way around instead.
Added various missing Relics in Mists and Sanguine Depths.
Both Tazavesh dungeons now have support for the Overpulled Enemies feature when using Live Sessions.
Removed various Relics around the 3rd boss in Plaguefall (Blizzard removed them).
Subcreation tier list for Tazavesh: So'leah's Gambit now shows up properly in the Shadowlands routes overview and other locations.
Pull connections are now updated properly when you delete pulls, and add new pulls using shift + clicking an enemy.
Editing a route's details now properly shows that this route is assigned to a team (or not).
Empty pulls no longer always generate a floor separator in the pulls sidebar.
Fixed a crash when attempting to view routes while your username contains two (or more) spaces after one another.
Various enemies that purposefully aren't included in the Keystone.guru mapping but exist in the MDT mapping no longer generate import warnings.
